extracted_playbook.title: Update DTM Soft to Version 1.60
extracted_playbook.description: Delta Electronics recommends updating DTM Soft to version 1.60 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that all control system devices and/or systems are not accessible from the internet to minimize network exposure.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control System Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). Ensure VPNs are updated to the most current version available and recognize that VPN security depends on the connected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of Industrial Control Systems (ICS) assets. Refer to CISA's ICS webpage for guidance and best practices.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
